About Me

Hi! I'm Jon ðŸ‘‹

I am a full stack web developer based in Swansea, Wales.

I work primarily with React, TypeScript, C#, and .NET Core. I also have experience in CSS (and Sass), AWS, and building static sites using Astro (like this website!).

I work as a Senior Software Engineer at Compare Northern Ireland where I am a key contributor across the full stack, focusing on both customer-facing and internal applications.

I'm passionate about clean, maintainable code and modern web development practices. I enjoy working with technologies that help create better user experiences and more efficient development workflows.

Technologies I work with

  • Frontend: React, TypeScript, CSS/Sass, HTML, Astro
  • Backend: .NET Core, C#, Entity Framework
  • Cloud & Tools: AWS, Docker, Git, CI/CD
  • Databases: SQL Server, PostgreSQL

When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, and sharing my knowledge through blog posts.
